verses.name: Luke 24:1
verses.text: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.

verses.name: Luke 24:2
verses.text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.

verses.name: Luke 24:3
verses.text: And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.

verses.name: Luke 24:4
verses.text: And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:

verses.name: Luke 24:5
verses.text: And as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
